address: Xã Tây Xuân, Huyện Tây Sơn, Tỉnh Bình Định
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Tây Xuân, Huyện Tây Sơn, Tỉnh Bình Định"**

Okay, so I've got "Xã Tây Xuân" from "Tỉnh Bình Định," which I know is now part of "Tỉnh Gia Lai" due to a previous merger. My task is to find the updated administrative unit.

First, I confirmed the provincial merger; Bình Định is now under Gia Lai based on resolution "60-NQ/TW". Next, I need to pinpoint where "Xã Tây Xuân" has gone.

My search through various resolutions led me to 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15 (Gia Lai). Bingo! Clause 20 in that resolution explicitly states the merger of "Xã Tây Xuân," along with "thị trấn Phú Phong" and "xã Bình Nghi," into a *new* "xã Tây Sơn". This resolution is key because it specifically targets Gia Lai, which is the pertinent province after the Bình Định merger.

To solidify this, I also checked the "New wards" list and found a matching entry: `{"ward_code":"21808","ward_name":"Xã Tây Sơn","province_name":"Tỉnh Gia Lai"}`.

I did, however, note other instances of "Tây Sơn" in the resolutions. For example, Đắk Lắk also created a "xã Tây Sơn," but that's irrelevant here because our starting address was in Bình Định, now Gia Lai. There was also a mention of "phường Tây Sơn" in Pleiku (Gia Lai) that was merged.

Therefore, my conclusive finding is that "Xã Tây Xuân" has been reorganized and is now part of the new "Xã Tây Sơn" in "Tỉnh Gia Lai".

citation.header: 60-NQ/TW: Các đơn vị hành chính cấp tỉnh mới sau sáp nhập, hợp nhất
citation.line: Hợp nhất tỉnh Gia Lai và tỉnh Bình Định, lấy tên là tỉnh Gia Lai
